game.name: Snow-Swept Quest
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A classic style turn-based RPG. Saya is stranded on an unfamiliar continent, surrounded by all manner of dangers. Will she make it home?
game.shortDescriptionEn: A classic style turn-based RPG. Saya is stranded on an unfamiliar continent, surrounded by all manner of dangers. Will she make it home?
